'''Márcio Oliveira''' was a Senior Developer for [[Bedrock Edition]] at Mojang Studios.

Previously, he worked at Realms together with [[Alexandre Pretto]]. <ref>{{citation|url=https://www.tecnogaming.com.br/games/conheca-marcio-oliveira-o-desenvolvedor-brasileiro-do-minecraft/4435|title=Meet Márcio Oliveira, the Brazilian Minecraft developer|date=December, 22, 2020|website=Tecnogaming}} (PT-BR)</ref> He also worked on the [[Minecraft Launcher]] as Tech Lead.
